quote: I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by.
A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
Never pick a fight with an ugly person, they've got nothing to lose.
I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
Never underestimate the power of stupid people in large groups.
Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.
Do your thing and don't care if they like it.
The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone.
Hiking is just walking where it's okay to pee.
Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt.
A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove you don't need it.
My favorite machine at the gym is the vending machine.
Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
A day without laughter is a day wasted.
Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
There is no sunrise so beautiful that it is worth waking me up to see it.
Whoever said money can't buy happiness didn't know where to shop.
People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
I am only human, although I regret it.
A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
I don't care what anybody says about me as long as it isn't true.
The person who knows how to laugh at himself will never cease to be amused.
Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
The best revenge is massive success.
If you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
Whatever you do, always give 100 percent. Unless you're donating blood.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Even a broken clock is right twice a day.
If you can't be kind, at least be vague.
The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
A peacock that rests on his tail feathers is just another turkey.
I've spent my whole life not talking to people, and I don't see why I should start now.
